segments.text: Good morning , Textile Import & Export Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is Miller . I'm calling about the appointment with Mr . Zhang for this afternoon . Something's just come up , I'm afraid the appointment will have to be rescheduled , I'm very sorry about the change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . Maybe we can make another arrangement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're very kind to say so . Thank you . Do you think tomorrow morning would suit him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid there's a bit of a problem . In fact , he's booked up the whole week except tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomorrow afternoon , Um ... you see , I've made an appointment with Mr . Comet for tomorrow afternoon . In order to meet Mr . Zhang , I have to cancel the appointment with Mr . Comet , I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm terribly sorry , Mr Miller , but Mr . Zhang is really busy this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . When do you think I can come and see him tomorrow afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please let me check . Tomorrow afternoon - Yes , he'll be free from 2:00 tomorrow afternoon . Do you think it's convenient for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's quite all right for me .
segments.speaker: S2
